original_title: Walt Disney Treasures - Behind the Scenes at the Walt Disney Studios
overview: Go behind the walls of The Walt Disney Studio as Walt invites you inside the world's most famous magic factory. It's not every day you'll learn tricks of the trade and satisfy your curiosity about what happens behind the scenes at the most creative bastion of family entertainment.
tagline: A Glimpse Behind the Studio Magic
title: Walt Disney Treasures - Behind the Scenes at the Walt Disney Studios
